summary: The team reviewed Q4 product development progress, discussed new initiatives, and planned for upcoming tasks. Key decisions included starting user testing on wireframes, implementing data export features, and preparing for holiday season traffic.
key_decisions: Start user testing on wireframes next week with a smaller group.
Implement data export features after API improvements.
Combine mobile optimization with dark mode implementation.
Prepare for holiday season traffic spike by scaling infrastructure and optimizing database queries.

tasks.task: Coordinate with the infrastructure team for holiday season prep.
Create a proposal for the mobile-first redesign by August 27th.
Implement data export features after API improvements.
Start user testing on the wireframes next week.
Prepare the staging environment for the beta program.
Schedule a meeting with the infrastructure team for next Tuesday.
Combine mobile optimization with dark mode implementation.
Start load testing preparations for holiday season.
Help with performance testing for holiday season.

action_items: Lisa Wang to share wireframes feedback.
Mike Rodriguez to schedule a call with the third-party verification service provider by Friday.
Jennifer Adams to prepare the staging environment for the beta program.
David Park to schedule a meeting with the infrastructure team for next Tuesday.
Mike Rodriguez and Jennifer Adams to collaborate on holiday traffic preparation.
Sarah Chen to get budget approval for holiday season prep by Friday.
topics_discussed: New initiatives: data export features, mobile optimization, and holiday season traffic preparation
Infrastructure and performance testing for holiday season
